problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,AC=5cm,BC=12cm,∠ACB=90°,把Rt△ABC绕BC所在的直线旋转一周得到一个几何体,则这个几何体的侧面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, AC = N_0, BC = N_1, ∠ACB = N_2, rotate Rt△ABC around the line where BC is located to obtain a geometry, then the lateral area of ​​this geometry is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵在Rt△ABC中,AC=5cm,BC=12cm,∠ACB=90°,∴由勾股定理得AB=13,∴圆锥的底面周长=10π,∴旋转体的侧面积=\frac{1}{2}×10π×13=65π,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题利用了勾股定理,圆的周长公式和扇形面积公式求解．
